segments.text: وآتينا عيس بن مر يم البينات
أن الله على كل شيء قديم
و one of the things that we do is that we leave outside our business
we leave outside all the issues that we carry
when we come here, our stresses, our problems
when we enter this place we bring our heart
we don't need to think about our problems
we don't need to think about our business
we don't need to think about anything
because Allah knows what you are carrying when you come here
Allah knows every single thing that's happening to you
so when you come in here you leave everything outside
if you want your problem solved
if you want your business to go well
anything you want Allah will solve it for you
but don't bring it in here
the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم
how many times did he say it's too far
and he's saying it's too far
what's he asking for forgiveness from
if he is the best of creation
if he is the one we know will go to the Jannah
we think why do we ask for it's too far
at the time of his thought
he used to bring his family together
and he used to make dua
that are close to the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم
we're talking about Omar is someone who's
very close to the Prophet صلى الله عليه وسلم
or Omar done the Tarawi right
why he is close to the Prophet
you think he will do something that will displease the Prophet
I think the problem is not
with other people the problem is for ourselves
you know nothing will benefit you on that day
except the one who comes to Allah with
you know when we're standing here
because if you leave it outside
we will benefit from this time
but if we carry everything in
is going to be thinking about everything
that we brought in and this is not what we want
you know I was reading one of the tips here
and saying the name of Allah
they might say the name of Jesus
the meat of the people of the book
even though they are saying this
he mentions that one of the companions
and I think this is something we need to think
He is the one who nourishes
sometimes we can't solve everything on our own
we just have to stand back
and this is something that I am learning for myself
there is a bit more patience
these things are going to come at me
and I am having to deal with all these issues
I am going to let Allah deal with this
just keep doing what I need to do
we need to be like that
so I pray insha'Allah that Allah gives us and guides us
to accept our deeds and forgive us
